lead_paragraph: Juergen Klinsmann insisted to the bitter end that he could turn around U.S. soccer fortunes but on Monday was handed one of his biggest defeats when he was dismissed as national coach and technical director.

headline.print_headline: Klinsmann Loses Chance to Revive U.S. World Cup Hopes
headline.main: Klinsmann Loses Chance to Revive U.S. World Cup Hopes

snippet: Juergen Klinsmann insisted to the bitter end that he could turn around U.S. soccer fortunes but on Monday was handed one of his biggest defeats when he was dismissed as national coach and technical director....
